verses.1: Midangte tawh a kipawl thei pha lote amah bek thupi a kisate hi a, midangteʼ cih khempeuh man a sak khat beek om lo hi.
verses.2: Mihaite in thu a tel theih zawh nading uh kin lo uh a, pil si, a kicih theih nading deihna bek tawh thu gen uh hi.
verses.3: Mawhna bawl leeng maizumna tawh kizom pah a, min siatna ngah leeng mindaina tawh kizom pah hi.
verses.4: Mihingteʼ kampau pen pilna kipatna suak thei a, tuipi bangin thuk-in luitui bangin a siang hi.
verses.5: Mimawhte angvanin diksak a, midikte mawhsak ding thuman lo hi.
verses.6: Mihaite in kitot nading a pat uh ciangin hong sat un, ci-in a ngenngen ahi hi.
verses.7: Mihaite a pau ciangin amauʼ siat nading mah a pau hi a, amauʼ kampau mah awk pih uh hi.
verses.8: Gensiatna pen an lim mahmah tawh kibang a, thakhatin i sungah kihup suk hi.
verses.9: Na a susia mite a hoih loh zah mahin a thadahte zong mihoih lo ahi hi.
verses.10: Topaʼ min pen tausang muanhuai tawh kibang a, thuman mite in belin lungmuangin om thei uh hi.
verses.11: Khuapi kiim a kulhpi in amah a hut bangin a hauhna in amah a hu dingin mihau pa in ngaihsun kha hi.
verses.12: A kiniamkhiatte in zahtakna ngah uh a, a kihisakte pen siat ding a manawh hi ta hi.
verses.13: A thu za khin nai lopi-in dawnkikna pen haina le maizumna ahi hi.
verses.14: Mihingteʼ lungsim in cinatna thuak zosak a, mihing lungsim kisia leh cih nading om nawn lo hi.
verses.15: Thungaihsun theite in a pilna uh behlap a, pilna a ngah nadingun mipilte in a bil uh tawh limtakin ngai uh hi.
verses.16: Letsong in a pia pa adingin lampi honsak a, mi liante tawh kimusak thei hi.
verses.17: Thukhenna zumah a lang pa in a thuk mateng a gen masa pa a thuman tawh kibang hi.
verses.18: Thugen a siam tuak mi nih zum sungah a kiseel ciangin kiciamna bek in thu khen zo hi.
verses.19: Sanggamte na huhna in khuapi muanhuai bangin hong hu a, sanggam tawh kitotna in kidon lohna piangsak hi.
verses.20: Mi khat in a kampauna hangin gilvahna ngah dinga, a thugenna hangin nuntakna ngah ding hi.
verses.21: Kampauna in sihna ahi a, hinna ahi zongin piangsak thei a, i kampauna bangin a piangte san loh phamawh hi.
verses.22: Zi a mu zote na hoih a mu hi a, Topaʼ maipha a ngah ahi hi.
verses.23: Mizawngte a pau ciangin thumna kam zang a, mihaute in a dawn ciangin kihihsakna kam zang hi.
verses.24: Lawm pawl khatte sauvei kimang lo a, lawm pawl khatte sanggam sangin kip zaw hi.
